name: Iron Man
description: Tony Stark suits up as Iron Man to protect the world.

name: Spider-Man
description: Peter Parker swings through the city as Spider-Man, fighting crime.

name: Captain America
description: Steve Rogers wields his shield as the patriotic Captain America.

name: Batman
description: Bruce Wayne prowls the streets of Gotham City as the Dark Knight.

name: Superman
description: Clark Kent fights for truth, justice, and the American way as Superman.

name: Wonder Woman
description: Diana Prince defends the world with her lasso and Amazonian powers.

name: Optimus Prime
description: The Autobot leader, Optimus Prime, battles the Decepticons.

name: Bumblebee
description: The Autobot scout, Bumblebee, aids in the fight against the Decepticons.

name: Megatron
description: The Decepticon leader, Megatron, seeks to conquer the universe.
